DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy cyclosporine ophthalmic solution vs. non-prescription treatment patient dry eye disease . Patient physician assessment complete baseline , follow-up visit ( follow-up visit variable per physician discretion ) final follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Cyclosporine Ophthalmic Emulsion Patients With Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis dry eye disease Currently use artificial tear daily Male female legal age consent Normal lid position closure Exclusion Criteria Patients currently use cyclosporine ophthalmic emulsion 0.05 % Participation investigational drug device study Any current previous topical ophthalmic oral cyclosporine use within last three year
